about_the_game:
Welcome to Wild Life! An adult open-world RPG, where players set out on a journey through a mysterious world filled with dangers and seductive attractions. Join Maya and Max as they explore a wide range of intimate encounters with diverse characters and uncover the mystery behind this unknown race, known as Kerpali, and discover the reason behind Maya’s unique differences.

Fight, Survive, and most importantly, have sex! You need to do everything possible to survive, how many friends and lovers will you make? How many enemies are waiting for you inside Kerpal?





Max ended up on a strange and unknown island, known as Kerpal. Fighting for survival, he discovers a new race called Kerpali, resembling humanoid animals with consciences, emotions, and desires. Among them, a rare girl named Maya holds an important secret that can be vital for his journey.



Kerpal is a tempting and mesmerizing land, but don't let those beautiful landscapes trick your eyes, Kerpal is a dangerous and deadly place! Don’t expect all of your contacts to be friendly, otherwise, this might end your journey. Be ready to fight and survive while you attempt to uncover all the mysteries that lie ahead on your adventure.



Let your sexual dreams and desires run wild and without restrictions! With over 2000 sex animations, experience the lust and all temptation of your partners that you will encounter during your journey, whether human or Kerpali! Do you have what it takes to satisfy their thirstiest needs?



Step into a richly detailed world of limitless exploration, interaction, and expression with our Unreal 4 release! Immerse yourself in a realm of stunning possibilities and tailored experiences unlike any other.

- Dive into over 1,000 high-end sex animations, creating a cosmos of sensual combinations at your fingertips.
- Craft your unique narrative with 50+ distinctive characters paired with character customization - your design, your rules.
- Dress for success, seduction, or anything in between with 50+ unique outfits.
- Satiate your desires, no matter how niche or mainstream, with our extensive range of kinks.
- Build your dream world with our detailed sandbox editor. Share your masterpiece with friends and community members on Discord.

Unleash your creativity and make your mark in our detailed sandbox editor. Here, you're the master of your universe. You can construct worlds according to your vision and share them with your friends and our vibrant community.

Welcome to the Ultimate Realm of Fantasy and Pleasure!

content_descriptors.notes:
A diverse sex positive gaming expierence with a great variety of different fetishes while staying within a respectful atmosphere.

No children NPC's (not even lookalikes) or any unconsensual sex interactions are provided by any of our content!

detailed_description:
Join Us on Discord!


Unreal 4 Version Now Available For Free!

We've replaced our 2021 Steam demo with the last full build we released on our crowdfunding campaign at the end of 2022. This Sandbox version is an absolute treasure trove of content. It offers a more profound glimpse into the unique experiences the Wild Life community has to offer - and we're making it free for everyone on Steam!

name: Wild Life

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 2600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1060
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 25 GB available space
  • Sound Card: On-board
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 5600X
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce RTX 3070
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 25 GB available space
  • Sound Card: On-board

short_description: Wild Life is an open-world Adult RPG, where players set out on a journey through a mysterious world filled with dangers and seductive attractions. Join Maya and Max as they navigate through intimate encounters with diverse characters and uncover the mystery behind Kerpal and Maya's unique secret!
supported_languages:
English*, French, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese
*languages with full audio support
